title: Jordan Peterson and Kierkegaard's Fear and Trembling. Free Solo
description:
Dr. Jim is back for a second talk this time going deeper on Kierkegaard's Fear and Trembling following up on my video. We also get into the movies Free Solo and Stranger than fiction. 
'
My video on JBP's Belief in God https://youtu.be/fVI21zUD-5A
Kierkegaard's Fear and Trembling https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fear_and_Trembling 
Free Solo https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7775622/
Stranger than Fiction Stranger than Fiction https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0420223/
Mimesis, Auerbach Representation in Western Culture https://www.amazon.com/Mimesis-Representation-Reality-Literature-Fiftieth-Anniversary/dp/069111336X

If you want to add to the notes on this video you can edit the google doc here http://bit.ly/2KVdsEB

Meetups: meaningful conversation
Jonathan Pageau in Seattle
Kierkegaard Fear and Trembling 
3 ways we can’t identify with Abraham
Modernity
He emerged in the version of that that was Hegel
You cannot move away from subjectivity, the individual will always be YOUR view on the world
Abraham as a parent
Jacob
Mimesis Aubach
The Movie Free Solo, El Capitan
Looking on the climber as we look at Abraham
You get gripped but you know how the film will end
He would have been something entirely different if he had fallen or if he hadn’t climbed
Last Temptation of Christ
Stranger than Fiction https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0420223/
The common heroic person
To notice that is sacramental
